name: Red Of Rosa (Betina)
description:
this is the first version of this project that I'm launching at pubilc.

This version will be the last of this project made on the platform  Adventuron Classroom this version does not contain all the mechanics of the final version (like a tutorial) or the images that represent the location where the player is   (future versions will certainly be very different)

If at any time you feel that you are in a dead end, remember:

1 )It is easier to catch bees with honey than with vinegar and you will kill more germs with vinegar than with honey.

2) flirt, intimidate, or try to make a new friend whenever you can.

3)face your obstacles in the eyes

4)collect all the treasures and throw them in the fountain to revive your mother
